dj.name: Ranger Nova
introLines: Mojave nights are quiet, so let's keep the airwaves warm.
Stay sharp out there. The dark has eyes.

ads: Mojave Water — distilled, tested, and approved by veteran rangers.
Need a lantern that lasts? Grab a Glowstick XL from the trading post.
interstitials: Keep your boots dry. The sand hides what it wants.
More tunes incoming — keep your radio tuned.
